contents.name: manufacturer
contents.comment: Company name of the device manufacturer. This could be the same as the name of the original equipment manufacturer (OEM). Ex. Contoso.

contents.name: model
contents.comment: Device model name or ID. Ex. Surface Book 2.

contents.name: swVersion
contents.comment: Version of the software on your device. This could be the version of your firmware. Ex. 1.3.45

contents.name: osName
contents.comment: Name of the operating system on the device. Ex. Windows 10 IoT Core.

contents.name: processorArchitecture
contents.comment: Architecture of the processor on the device. Ex. x64 or ARM.

contents.name: processorManufacturer
contents.comment: Name of the manufacturer of the processor on the device. Ex. Intel.

contents.name: totalStorage
contents.comment: Total available storage on the device in kilobytes. Ex. 2048000 kilobytes.

contents.name: totalMemory
contents.comment: Total available memory on the device in kilobytes. Ex. 256000 kilobytes.
